title: ONDCP Deputy Director James Carroll’s Statement Regarding the Passage of the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act (H.R. 6) – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
October 4, 2018
Office of National Drug Control PolicyI commend Congress for passing this essential legislation, which will bolster our work to combat the opioid crisis.  As the Trump Administration and Congress continue working together to combat our addiction crisis, we are very pleased to see the reauthorization of the White House Office of National Drug Control Policy.  This legislation makes meaningful reforms to keep illicit drugs out of our communities and help people who are addicted get the treatment they need.  I want to thank Members of Congress for leading this bipartisan effort to help our states and communities prevent drug use, treat addiction locally, and stop the flow of drugs into their communities.
